"Hey you two!": "Oh, hello Xiera. So anyways..."
"Wait, wait a minute! Wait! Wait just a minute! This is an unusual phenomenon! Look here!"
"Now think carefully! Weird, isn't it? This situation!?"
"1. You're taller...?"
"2. You're bigger...?"
"It only looks that way because I'm always sitting down!"
"How did I grow bigger...? Hey, where are you looking?!"
"Uh... I'm sorry, Xiera, I don't know."
"I'm right here in front of you!"
"Hm? Sorry, Xiera. I'm not as smart as you think I am..."
"1. Is it because you're outside the Bridge?"
"2. Is it because you're standing and walking?"
"That's right!"
"No, I've always done that! It's because I'm outside the Bridge!"
"Oh, that's right... It's probably our first time seeing Xiera outside the Bridge."
"That's it! Xiao just came by and gave me permission to leave!"
"All my calculations are done in parallel with Xiao, so it's not a problem if I take a little break from work to do whatever I want!"
"So, until now, you've never left the Bridge?"
"I've been to the maintenance room too, but nowhere else. After all, communications were enough."
"Hah! So this is what you see every day! It's so different from seeing it on a screen, such a fresh perspective!"
"I have to use this time well if I want to see everything! See you later, you two!"
"Xiera... She was really over the moon about this, but will she be safe on her own?"
